GMessageBuffer.h

00001 #ifndef GMESSAGEBUFFER_H_
00002 #define GMESSAGEBUFFER_H_
00003 
00004 #include <vector>
00005 #include "utils/global.h"
00006 #include "utils/Combiner.h"
00007 #include "utils/communication.h"
00008 #include "utils/vecs.h"
00009 using namespace std;
00010 
00011 template <class EdgeT, class MsgVecPointer>
00012 struct GhostEntry {
00013     EdgeT edge;
00014     MsgVecPointer msgvec; //pointer
00015 
00016     GhostEntry(EdgeT edge, MsgVecPointer msgvec)
00017     {
00018         this->edge = edge;
00019         this->msgvec = msgvec;
00020     }
00021 };
00022 
00023 template <class GVertexT>
00024 class GMessageBuffer {
00025 public:
00026     typedef typename GVertexT::KeyType KeyT;
00027     typedef typename GVertexT::MessageType MessageT;
00028     typedef typename GVertexT::HashType HashT;
00029     typedef vector<MessageT> MessageContainerT;
00030     typedef hash_map<KeyT, int> Map; //int = position in v_msg_bufs //CHANGED FOR VADD
00031     typedef Vecs<KeyT, MessageT, HashT> VecsT;
00032     typedef typename VecsT::Vec Vec;
00033     typedef typename VecsT::VecGroup VecGroup;
00034     typedef typename Map::iterator MapIter;
00035 
00036     typedef typename GVertexT::EdgeType EdgeT;
00037     typedef vector<EdgeT> EdgeContainer;
00038     typedef hash_map<int, EdgeContainer> NeighborTable;
00039     typedef typename NeighborTable::iterator TableIter;
00040 
00041     typedef GhostEntry<EdgeT, int> GEntry; //int = position in v_msg_bufs //CHANGED FOR VADD
00042     typedef vector<GEntry> GEntryList;
00043     typedef hash_map<KeyT, GEntryList> GhostTable;
00044 
00045     void init(vector<GVertexT*> vertexes)
00046     {
00047         v_msg_bufs.resize(vertexes.size());
00048         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00049             GVertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00050             in_messages[v->id] = i; //CHANGED FOR VADD
00051         }
00052     }
00053 
00054     void add_message(const KeyT& id, const MessageT& msg)
00055     {
00056         hasMsg(); //cannot end yet even every vertex halts
00057         out_messages.append(id, msg);
00058     }
00059 
00060     void add_gmessage(GVertexT* vertex, const MessageT& field)
00061     {
00062         hasMsg(); //cannot end yet even if every vertex halts
00063         vector<int>& mac = vertex->machines();
00064         for (int i = 0; i < mac.size(); i++) {
00065             out_gmessages.vecs[mac[i]].push_back(msgpair<KeyT, MessageT>(vertex->id, field));
00066         }
00067     }
00068 
00069     Map& get_messages()
00070     {
00071         return in_messages;
00072     }
00073 
00074     void combine()
00075     {
00076         //apply combiner
00077         Combiner<MessageT>* combiner = (Combiner<MessageT>*)get_combiner();
00078         if (combiner != NULL)
00079             out_messages.combine();
00080     }
00081 
00082     vector<GVertexT*>& sync_messages(vector<GhostTable>& ghosts)
00083     {
00084         int np = get_num_workers();
00085         int me = get_worker_id();
00086 
00087         //------------------------------------------------
00088         // get messages from remote
00089         vector<vector<GVertexT*> > add_buf(_num_workers);
00090         //set send buffer
00091         for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++) {
00092             GVertexT* v = to_add[i];
00093             add_buf[hash(v->id)].push_back(v);
00094         }
00095 
00096         //================================================
00097 
00098         //exchange msgs
00099         //exchange vertices to add
00100         all_to_all_cat(out_messages.getBufs(), add_buf, out_gmessages.vecs);
00101 
00102         //================================================
00103 
00104         //------------------------------------------------
00105         //delete sent vertices
00106         for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++) {
00107             GVertexT* v = to_add[i];
00108             if (hash(v->id) != _my_rank)
00109                 delete v;
00110         }
00111         to_add.clear();
00112         //collect new vertices to add
00113         for (int i = 0; i < np; i++) {
00114             to_add.insert(to_add.end(), add_buf[i].begin(), add_buf[i].end());
00115         }
00116 
00117         //================================================
00118         //Change of G33
00119         int oldsize = v_msg_bufs.size();
00120         v_msg_bufs.resize(oldsize + to_add.size());
00121         for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++) {
00122             int pos = oldsize + i;
00123             in_messages[to_add[i]->id] = pos; //CHANGED FOR VADD
00124         }
00125 
00126         //------------------------------------------------
00127 
00128         VecGroup& gbufs = out_gmessages.vecs;
00129         for (int i = 0; i < _num_workers; i++) {
00130             Vec& buf = gbufs[i];
00131             for (int j = 0; j < buf.size(); j++) {
00132                 msgpair<KeyT, MessageT>& pair = buf[j];
00133                 GEntryList& local_nbs = ghosts[hash(pair.key)][pair.key];
00134                 for (int k = 0; k < local_nbs.size(); k++) {
00135                     GEntry nb = local_nbs[k];
00136                     MessageT msg = pair.msg;
00137                     nb.edge.relay(msg);
00138                     v_msg_bufs[nb.msgvec].push_back(msg); //merge ghost msg to the ordinary in-msg pool
00139                 }
00140             }
00141         }
00142         out_gmessages.clear();
00143 
00144         // gather all messages
00145         for (int i = 0; i < np; i++) {
00146             Vec& msgBuf = out_messages.getBuf(i);
00147             for (int i = 0; i < msgBuf.size(); i++) {
00148                 MapIter it = in_messages.find(msgBuf[i].key);
00149                 if (it != in_messages.end()) //filter out msgs to non-existent vertices
00150                     v_msg_bufs[it->second].push_back(msgBuf[i].msg); //CHANGED FOR VADD
00151             }
00152         }
00153         //clear out-msg-buf
00154         out_messages.clear();
00155 
00156         return to_add;
00157     }
00158 
00159     void add_vertex(GVertexT* v)
00160     {
00161         hasMsg(); //cannot end yet even every vertex halts
00162         to_add.push_back(v);
00163     }
00164 
00165     long long get_total_msg()
00166     {
00167         return out_messages.get_total_msg();
00168     }
00169 
00170     long long get_total_gmsg()
00171     {
00172         return out_gmessages.get_total_msg();
00173     }
00174 
00175     int get_total_vadd()
00176     {
00177         return to_add.size();
00178     }
00179 
00180     vector<MessageContainerT>& get_v_msg_bufs()
00181     {
00182         return v_msg_bufs;
00183     }
00184 
00185 private:
00186     VecsT out_messages;
00187     VecsT out_gmessages;
00188     Map in_messages;
00189     vector<GVertexT*> to_add;
00190     vector<MessageContainerT> v_msg_bufs;
00191     HashT hash;
00192 };
00193 
00194 #endif /* GMESSAGEBUFFER_H_ */
